isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - LIGHT SYSTEMS - OPERATION - Cab Clearance and Identification Lights

svcproc.title: Cab Clearance and Identification Lights
svcproc.para: As described in Cab and Trailer Light Switch and Relay Wiring power is fed to circuit 68E. It then flows through circuit 68D, fuse F8-C, circuit 68C, and circuit 58A to the cab clearance and identification lights. After dividing up to flow through the lights, the power flows through ground circuits 11-GAC, 11-GAB, 11-GAC, and 11-GB to right dash ground stud.
